sentence.Network_en: The terrain's high points provide a panoramic view of Los Angeles.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这个地区的制高点能够看到洛杉矶的全景。

sentence.Network_en: Most rooms enjoy panoramic views of the sea.
sentence.Network_cn: 大多数房间都能看到海的全景.

sentence.Network_en: In a panoramic survey of nature, speed is interesting because it has a ceiling.
sentence.Network_cn: 概观自然全景, 速率是有趣的,因为它有一个上限.

这是由德国科技大学的学生们(主要是 Jonas Pfeil)弄出来的作品,简单说就是一颗球形的全景摄影机(Panoramic Camera),外壳是泡绵材质,内建36个镜头,画素皆是两百万.

entry.def: If you have a panoramic view, you can see a long way over a wide area.

example.ex: The terrain's high points provide a panoramic view of Los Angeles.
example.tran: 在这个地区的制高点能够看到洛杉矶的全景。

means.word_mean: 1. as from an altitude or distance;
